mean_en: something that is simple or ordinary but enjoyable
word_etyma: simpl简单的 + icity名词后缀 → simplicity 简单，简明
short_phrase: the simplicity of a single flower
sentence: I love the simplicity of the single flower floating on the water.
sentence_trans: 我很喜欢一朵花漂浮在水面上这种简单（的画面）。
sentence_phrase: the simplicity of the single flower
